title: Ryno Slab is born.
content:
After 9 months of hard labor, my newest child has arrived. His name is Ryno Slab. He's a tough cookie but don't tell him I called him that. I can't say any more because he'll kick my ass.  
 [Ryno Slab at MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023082555/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/philatype/ryno-slab/)
author: kosal

comments.content: love the x, it is kinda weird looking, but cool in it's own way
Thanks. I'm glad you mention that, because I was unsure whether or not to stick with a more traditional x.
you could have done, but this gives brings a little character, it is still readable
